title: AI can forecast your future health - just like the weather

title: AI-designed viruses are here and already killing bacteria
description: Artificial intelligence can draw cat pictures and write emails. Now, the same technology can compose a working genome. A research team in California says it used AI to propose new genetic codes for viruses—and managed to get several of these to replicate and kill bacteria. The scientists, based at Stanford and the non-profit Arc Institute,…
content:

title: New AI tool ‘can estimate the risk of more than 1,000 diseases for people in one go’
description: A new artificial intelligence (AI) tool can estimate the risk of more than 1,000 diseases for people in one go, providing key information about their future health, research suggests.
content:
Experts have trained and tested the model using anonymised patient record data to help predict what might happen to people over the next decade and beyond.
The team behind the research hope the new model will be in the hands of doctors in five to 10 ... [3544 chars]

title: Hong Kong to roll out AI use in 200 public service procedures by end of 2027
description: John Lee says in policy address that artificial intelligence should be developed as an industry and integrated with various sectors.

title: AI may boost global trade value by nearly 40% by 2040: WTO
description:
Artificial intelligence is seen lowering trade costs and reshaping production.

content:
